measure.name: set_residential_epw_file
measure.description: Sets the EPW weather file (EPW), supplemental data specific to the location, and daylight saving time start/end dates. See https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-BuildStock#workflows for supported workflows using this measure.
measure.modeler_description: Sets the weather file, Building America climate zone, site information (e.g., latitude, longitude, elevation, timezone), design day information (from the DDY file), the mains water temperature using the correlation method, and the daylight saving time start/end dates.

argument.name: weather_directory
argument.description: Absolute (or relative) directory to weather files.

argument.name: weather_file_name
argument.description: Name of the EPW weather file to assign. The corresponding DDY file must also be in the same directory.

argument.name: dst_start_date
argument.description: Set to 'NA' if no daylight saving. For TMY weather, a value of 'auto' will correspond to 'April 7'. For AMY weather, a value of 'auto' will correspond to the daylight saving start date found in the header of the epw file, if it exists; if it doesn't, 'NA' will be used.

argument.name: dst_end_date
argument.description: Set to 'NA' if no daylight saving. For TMY weather, a value of 'auto' will correspond to 'October 26'. For AMY weather, a value of 'auto' will correspond to the daylight saving end date found in the header of the epw file, if it exists; if it doesn't, 'NA' will be used.
